last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Funnel
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Party Down South crew gets together one last time to share their favorite memories and reline their wildest moments from all five vacations together.

name: Party Down South
overview: From the producers of Jersey Shore comes the most outrageous Party Down South. Follow eight young, brazen adults for one wild summer of extreme fun. Their summer vacation spot, Murrells Inlet, South Carolina, may never be the same after these fast friends work, party and bond with one another over their common love of the South.

episodes.name: Go Hard or Go Home
episodes.overview: South Carolina will never be the same when eight of the biggest, baddest personalities in the south come together in one house to work hard and party even harder for one wild summer.

episodes.name: What's Your Name Again
episodes.overview: After the chaos of the first night in the house, everyone struggles to piece together what happened and get to know each other.

episodes.name: Love Triangles and Tribulations
episodes.overview: The gang meets Lucas, a hard-partying local who invites them to his river house for a mud-slinging day of four-wheeling and redneck sledding.

episodes.name: It's My Birrrday
episodes.overview: Following a wild bar fight near the marina, the gang is worried they might get fired. The next day, it's Lyle's birthday and his roommates surprise him with a boat, a keg and a beach party he'll never forget.

episodes.name: That Wasn't Whiskey
episodes.overview: Lyle begins to develop feelings for Mattie, and the pressure of juggling two women in the house drives him to have a serious talk with Lauren. Ryan makes a mortifying mistake after taking a swig out of a stray whiskey bottle.

episodes.name: Mattie Martha Meltdown
episodes.overview: After Mattie turns into her alter-ego, Martha, her argument with Tiffany turns physical. To relieve the tension in the house, the gang heads out to the country and makes dry ice bombs to blow things up.

episodes.name: Heartburn or Heartbreak?
episodes.overview: Lyle's jealousy over Mattie's booty popping leads to severe heartburn that leaves Lyle literally foaming at the mouth. After Mattie brings home her new crush, Tiffany throws fuel on the fire and pushes Lyle to his limit.

episodes.name: Cuddling Days Are Over
episodes.overview: When Mattie discovers that Lyle's been twisting the truth about their relationship, she confronts him head on. Tiffany finally brings a man home, but keeping him there is a lot harder than she expected.

episodes.name: Rednecks In Heat
episodes.overview: Sexual frustration in the house is at an all time high as Tiffany makes a move on a roommate, Ryan and Lyle find love in the same bed and Walt makes a deep connection behind a bathroom door.

episodes.name: Payback's A Fish
episodes.overview: Walt and the girls face off in a stanky prank war. Mattie gets a letter from a guy that leaves her in tears.

episodes.name: The After Party (1)
episodes.overview: Host Christine Lakin joins the entire cast as they look back at the craziest, most shocking events of the summer.

episodes.name: The After Party (2)
episodes.overview: The fun continues in hour two of the reunion, as host Christine Lakin shares more of the summer's wildest moments and never-before-seen footage with the entire cast.

episodes.name: Hot Mess Express
episodes.overview: This season, the cast packs their bags to raise some hell in one of the wildest party towns in the south -- Athens, Ga. Taylor brings her Bible, as well as news of a new boyfriend, to the house. As the booze start flowing, so does Daddy's frustrations over Taylor's new relationship. Emotions run high, and the clothes come off, leaving the roommates with their wildest night yet.

episodes.name: We Gonna Fight or We Gonna Kiss?
episodes.overview: Settling into their new digs in Athens, Ga., proves to be no easy feat for the gang. Wild Lyle makes an early appearance and takes a beating for it from one of his roommates. The guys mess around with Daddy but take it too far and push him to his limit. And Daddy's further erratic behavior is starting to convince everybody else in the house there might be something brewing between him and one of the roomies.

episodes.name: Lil Bit of a Problem
episodes.overview: The gang starts their new job and gets wild in downtown Athens while checking out the local party scene. Daddy struggles to hide his secret about Lil Bit, and when she gushes about her boyfriend, he finally explodes. While the house takes the brunt of the damage, his friendship with Lil' Bit may never be the same again.

episodes.name: Stop Stalking
episodes.overview: Everybody seems ready to move on from the aftermath of last night's fight between Daddy and Lil Bit, but as more details start trickling out, the ongoing drama threatens to destroy several more friendships. Out on the town, Walt meets a special little lady, but Lyle goes home empty-handed, leading to a scuffle with a roommate who refuses to back down.

episodes.name: Get Over Me
episodes.overview: Now that the truth about Daddy and Lil Bit has come out, she's dead set on going home. The rest of the roomies hope a four-wheeling trip and a wild night on the town could be enough to keep the house together. Daddy's hot friends arrive to kick the party up a notch and light a fire under the girls in the house.

episodes.name: Love Is Blind. And Drunk.
episodes.overview: Daddy's friends attempt to improve his spirits. Tiffany attempts to distance herself from Hunter, and ends up in the arms of somebody else.

episodes.name: I Banged Your Girl
episodes.overview: Lil Bit's boyfriend Grant comes to town and meets the family. Daddy promises to be nice, but all the roommates beg to differ. Tiffany calls Hunter to straighten out their rocky relationship. The gang goes out to Boarshead for an epic Dollar Drink night.

episodes.name: Hurricane Martha
episodes.overview: The roommates head to Cabo for a Party Down South of the border. It's nothing but fun -- beaches, booze and booty-shaking contests -- until they realize they're being stalked by a crazy senorita ... Martha!

episodes.name: I'm a Baboso, Baby!
episodes.overview: The roommates head to Cabo for a Party Down South of the border. It's nothing but fun -- beaches, booze and booty-shaking contests -- until they realize they're being stalked by a crazy senorita ... Martha!

episodes.name: Livin' La Vida Martha
episodes.overview: The roommates continue to Party Down South of the border, but it looks like Martha may be joining them in Cabo! Catch a glimpse of the action.

episodes.name: What Happens in Cabo...
episodes.overview: The roommates end their time in Cabo with a bang and head back to Athens-- but not without a casualty along the way. Catch an exclusive look.

episodes.name: The Truth Comes Out
episodes.overview: Lil Bit and Daddy continue flirting and getting closer, but it's not sitting well with the rest of the house. Martha becomes Murray's wingman. Tiffany confronts Lil Bit about messing with Daddy's feelings, and Taylor finally comes to terms with how she's been acting.

episodes.name: Out With a Bang
episodes.overview: The housemates' stay in Athens, Ga. is coming to a close but things are crazy as ever; Martha disrupts Mattie's birthday; Lyle gets bruised; Daddy has company in his bed.

episodes.name: The After Party
episodes.overview: The party continues when your favorite Southerners reunite onstage to recap their latest vacation. There's plenty of drama and comedy as they discuss sex, lies and being a Baboso in another country.

episodes.name: I Don't Do Dibs
episodes.overview: The new group of wild southerners start partying at their decked-out beach house in Biloxi, but after a few beers, a catfish breaks out when Aston calls dibs on Tommy.

episodes.name: Feel the Burn
episodes.overview: The roommates don't hold back on their first night out partying together; Raven decides Tommy is not for her and sets her sights on Bradley; Ashton is jealous that Raven is hooking up with all the guys in the house.

episodes.name: Strictly Cuddle Buddies
episodes.overview: The question of who will get together flies around the house, especially with Ashton, Raven and Bradley.

episodes.name: Three's a Party
episodes.overview: Bradley is confused when he learns that both Ashton and Raven both have feelings for him and the rest of the house tells him he needs to make a decision.

episodes.name: Bradley Who?
episodes.overview: Bradley chooses Raven, leaving Ashton in tears, but Ashton's tears don't last long when she meets a new guy.

episodes.name: The Boss's Daughter
episodes.overview: After Duke's fight to revive Ashton, she comes back ready to party it up like never before. Meanwhile, the sexual frustration in the house reaches a boiling point; and Magan makes her needs known to all.

episodes.name: Sunday Funday
episodes.overview: Tommy lands in hot water with Magan after be brings two girls back to the house; Duke lands in literal hot water with Magan's feisty friends.

episodes.name: Fishin' for Trouble
episodes.overview: The gang goes on a fishing trip and things heat up between Tommy and Brittany, but messing with the boss' daughter could jeopardize his job.

episodes.name: Got Milk
episodes.overview: The roommates head to the woods for some rafting and mudding after an intense intervention at the house.

episodes.name: Roll With The Punches
episodes.overview: Bradley gets into a bar fight that could land him in jail; Ashton moves on from Tyler and decides to give Brandon a real chance.

episodes.name: Meet My Dad, Brad
episodes.overview: After Bradley and Raven's fight, Hurricane Hunter rallies the roommates on a mission to finish their keg; Magan goes toe to high-heeled toe with a feisty local.

episodes.name: The After Party
episodes.overview: The entire crew gets together for one more party to discuss their incredible summer in Biloxi but not without a lot of drama.

episodes.name: I'll Show You Crazy!
episodes.overview: Hannah's new love interest divides the house; tensions are running high, so Tiffany and Hannah get into a huge fight.

episodes.name: Blood, Sweat, and Beers
episodes.overview: After a chaotic first night in the house, Tiffany must deal with the fallout from her fight with Hannah; a backflip gone wring lands Murray in the hospital; an emotional Lyle is haunted by his past relationship.

episodes.name: Miss Martha's Wild Ride
episodes.overview: The group barely survives a crazy taxi ride with an angry Mattie; Lauren is sick of her shady boyfriend's ways; Walt and Murray's prank gets hairy.

episodes.name: It's Not a Dream, It's a Vision
episodes.overview: Daddy predicts Walt's future; Lyle can't stop thinking about Santana and starts to think about taking their relationship to the next level.

episodes.name: Sagin' Cajuns
episodes.overview: Hurricane Martha lands on the house and the boys do their best not to let it ruin their night; Mattie calls a family meeting the next day to apologize and the housemates start to vent about all their issues.

episodes.name: Party Down, South Beach
episodes.overview: When things have finally calmed down around the house, the roommates hope that Tiffany and Lauren's boyfriends won't bring new drama when they come to visit; the group decides to take a road trip to South Beach.

episodes.name: Gone Girl
episodes.overview: The trip to Miami is off to a good start until shots get poured; Mattie goes missing and Don "Daddy" Johnson is on the case; Lyle makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: The Bou to My Dreaux
episodes.overview: Lyle's girlfriend, Santana, comes to visit but she doesn't realize her life is going to change forever; the roommates get together to plan a perfect marriage proposal for Lyle.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Martha
episodes.overview: Lyle gets an answer for his proposal; the gang throws Mattie an 80s skating birthday party; Tiffany learns some troubling news about Hannah's boyfriend, Cody; Martha redecorates the boys' bedroom.

episodes.name: We Got It Goatin'
episodes.overview: As the gang spends their last weekend in St. Petersburg, they decide they want to end it on a high note; single Lauren hits the town; Murray catches a shark; Walt brings home an animal lover; Hannah confronts Cody about his infidelity.

episodes.name: The After Party
episodes.overview: The cast gets together to dish about their latest vacation in St. Petersburg, Florida including the good, the bad and the hurricanes.

episodes.name: Taxicab Confessions
episodes.overview: The crew arrives at their beautiful new vacation house in Savannah, Georgia; Lauren and Tiffany struggle to keep an explosive secret from Lyle, while Murray and Hannah must console Mattie.

episodes.name: Lyle's Achy-Breaky Heart
episodes.overview: Tiffany and Lauren tell Lyle devastating news about his fiancée, Santana; Walt attempts to woo a woman into bed by playing his guitar; Daddy brings the wrong girl home from the bar.

episodes.name: She Devil Went Down to Georgia
episodes.overview: Murray wraps up his personal business in Mississippi and returns to the house to learn that the girls are still up in Lyle and Santana's relationship.

episodes.name: Southern Discomfort
episodes.overview: The house is divided when a secret comes out about Lyle's fiancée that Tiffany and Lauren have major issues with; Lyle is forced to make a decision that could change his life forever.

episodes.name: Cowboys and Ninjas
episodes.overview: After healthy input from her roommates, Mattie makes a decision regarding her relationship with DJ; feeling like she's missing out, Hannah invites her boyfriend Cody to the house so she can get some lovin; too.

episodes.name: True Lies
episodes.overview: Lyle gets a shocking text from Santana; the gang goes ghost hunting and gets more than they bargained for; Mattie is forced to choose between her roommates and her family back home.

episodes.name: Wild Lyle Down
episodes.overview: Wild Lyle returns when the gang decides to take a weekend vacation to a NASCAR race, but after some unexpected news about Santana, he goes off the deep end and lands in an ambulance, rushing to the hospital.

episodes.name: Watermelon, Meet Lartha
episodes.overview: As Lyle spends time in the hospital, Mattie gives Santana a piece of her mind; Lauren flips her lid and the whole kitchen pays for it.

episodes.name: Single on a Segway
episodes.overview: Lyle officially breaks it off with Santana over the phone; the crew bets on their Segway race--the boys versus girls, with the losers becoming their opponents' servants for a day; a newly-single Lyle rekindles old desires in Mattie.

episodes.name: Foul Weather Friend
episodes.overview: Bubba surprises Tiffany with an unexpected visit, but Tiffany isn't sure how things will go after their recent arguments; after being rejected by numerous men at the bar, Hurricane Martha threatens the shores of Savannah.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: The cast says goodbye to Savannah and to each other for the last time; old wounds open up between Tiffany and Bubba; Santana attempts to win back Lyle; the crew buries a time capsule in the backyard.

episodes.name: The Final Funnel
episodes.overview: The Party Down South crew gets together one last time to share their favorite memories and reline their wildest moments from all five vacations together.
